title: How to actually enjoy league
body:
Open up the options menu and turn off the following:
team chat
all chat
pings volume
announcer volume
music volume
ambient volume
player names

Then once the game loads, just press enter and drag that little window in the bottom left out of the screen so you can't even see it. Then proceed to mute all so you don't hear the annoying scratch noise.

Lastly find the games secret hidden menu and disable the option that says "give a shit".
